mapper.select: select count(*) from expert_table E,PORTFOLIO P where e.expert_ID = p.PF_EXID and P.PF_CATE = 1

select * from (select rownum rnum, b.* from (select E.* , P.PF_CATE , P.PF_ONE,P.PF_SAVEPROFILE,P.PF_GRADE from expert_table E,PORTFOLIO P where e.expert_ID = p.PF_EXID and P.PF_CATE = 1)
b) where rnum > = #{start} and rnum < = #{end}
